thread.section_title: DialAFlight Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of DialAFlight | www.dialaflight.com | 9 of 122
thread.title: Johan

author: Johan
title: Johan
text:
DialAFlight consistently provides us amazing service and have meant that for any long haul flights we rarely find ourselves spending hours on Skyscanner and other comparison sites.
As an example, on our most recent trip the flight prices provided by DialAFlight were roughly in line with the best of Skyscanner rates.
But the DialAFlight guys were able to find a hidden deal that included car hire for the near 3 week holiday adding a significant saving to the trip.
Without a doubt, DialAFlight has made our lives easier when it comes to long haul flights.
